name: Kangaroo Market
description:
The STONKS market is out of control!

Only a true Hero can survive in a market this volatile.

Ride the market waves to satisfy your lust for gold, but beware of the hostiles who want to take advantage of your hard earned wealth. Time your jumps across the hills and valleys, always looking forward. Never miss an opportunity to turn a profit!

Collect 20 coins and you're on fire! Launch fireballs to eliminate your enemies for a short time.

Collect 50 coins and you're untouchable! Gain an extra life, for a maximum of 6.

Play in browser.

 L/R Arrow Keys, A, D, or touch left to run,

U/D Arrow keys, W, S, space, or touch right to jump. 

ESC to open menu and pause game. 

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Did you enjoy this game? Don't forget to rate and leave a comment!

Why not show it to your friends? Show it to your friends friends! Show it to your family! Show it to your families's friends! Show it to your friend's family! Show it to your Dog! Show it to a Wall street investor. Show it to a Wall street investor's dog! Show it to a Kangaroo! Take the Kangaroo to Wall street! Show Wall street showing it to the Kangaroo! Perform step 2. Profit!
